author: brane
msg: Introduce bdb_env_t, a new struct that centralizes BDB environment
management and error reporting.  It combines the properties of the
DB_ENV handle and the (now gone) bdb_errcall_baton_t.
Creates and initializes a bdb_env_t. All uses updated.
* bdb/env.c (bdb_error_gatherer, create_env): Moved here from fs.c.
(svn_fs_bdb__open): Update signature. Include logic from fs.c:allocate_env.
(svn_fs_bdb__remove): New. Implements the meat of base_delete_fs.
* bdb/bdb-err.h: Include bdb/env.h instead of fs.h.
Replace all uses of bdb_errcall_baton_t with bdb_env_t.
* bdb/bdb-err.c: Replace all uses of bdb_errcall_baton_t with bdb_env_t.
(bdb_errcall_baton_t): Remove. Replaced by bdb_env_t in bdb/env.h.
(svn_fs_t): Replace members 'env' and 'errcall_baton' with new member
(allocate_env): Disable; replaced with logic in svb_fs_bdb__open.
Align with changes to svn_fs_t, svb_fs_bdb__open, svn_fs_bdb__close and
* trail.c: Align with changes to svn_fs_t.

author: ivan
msg: Add CleanCommandLine parameter to VS.NET project templates.
This eliminates "Error spawning ." errors when cleaning solution

author: ivan
msg: * build/generator/neon.vcproj.ezt: Fix parameter for neon makefile

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r17638, r17639 from trunk to 1.3.x branch.
For compatibility with 1.2.x apps, don't report errors when apps try to destroy
pools that were already automatically destroyed. Followup to r17082.

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r17614 from trunk to the 1.3.x branch.
